Process

Archive

Project

Homepage Vision Design system

Client

Verizon

Description

A modular system, where component types could easily react, stack differently, and the messaging could adapt cleanly and quickly. R/GA was tasked with evolving and advancing Verizon's homepage experience. It was an opportunity to prototype and experiment with ways that the brand parsed user types and data, while simultaneously expanding the brand language

 

 

Project team

Taylor Geick, Lars Hansson, Nicholas Karlovich, Kris Kiger, Aaron Perez, Adam Zoltowski

 

 

My role

Senior Designer (for R/GA)
